text: Na'ankure Adoniza menina uramino ve bulimakao afutamine, afovage bulimakao anentatamine, sipisipi afutaminena rama'a aheno kresramana nevuno, kini ne'moka mofavreramine pristi ne' Abiatane, sondia vahe'mofo ugagota kva ne' Joapunena kehige'za avuga umanine'za ne'zane tinena nene'za zazakna kini manino vugahie hu'za nehaze.
